Reviews.Title: “Good choice”

Reviews.Content: hotel hortus location 15 minutes walk amsterdam central easy access main attractions botanical garden corner zoo 34 minutes dam square red light district 10 minutes quiet safe top floor stairs steep issue difficult basic expected price bed sleep amenities shared bathroom accommodation twin breakfast included happy price understand appeal happy hotel hortus gladly stay

Reviews.Content: slightly expectation based reviews encountered spent amsterdam friend location 1 km center main reason selecting hotel travelled friend paid combined 4 nights ive stayed 20 hotels hostels price ranges id hortus comfortable except nice laidback staff stayed nr 16 pros nice friendly service hotel keepers fast wifi lobby free pool table lobby free coffee 10 pm cons wifi top floor 3rd stated otherwise cold heaters didnt time shower toilet communal toilet low ceiling 3x4 meters dont smoke distinct smell narrow stairways painted stay safe deposit box didnt

Reviews.Title: “Excellent choice, friendly staff, and nice location”
Reviews.Author: Khaled3
Reviews.Content: 3 days hotel located quiet east amsterdam 5 min walks zoo 12 min centre city 15 min walk central station impressed level cleanliness sitting breakfast watch tv freely cooking facilities equiped nice shower sink instant hot water nice street view toiled shared ok owner nice helpful friendly guests internet access secured via 2 pc sitting free wifi carefull smoking allowed sometimes stinky cannabis bit noisy sitting guests happy mood free tea coffee day fancy doing excellent value money tricks close sightseeing central station amsterdam seen walks tram taxis little guide strongly recommend nice budget holiday

Reviews.Title: “Clean,comfortable,laidback and smoker friendly”

Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean, friendly.. good location!”
Reviews.Author: _chaka_82
Reviews.Content: girlfriend stayed 3 nights beg oct 2010 clean simple 2 double bunk beds safe tv bathroom sink hairdryer staff shared showers clean wait time 3 days staff friendly helpful located calm 78 minute walk 1012 mins dam square nice stay spend couple days exploring amsterdam stay close downtown

Reviews.Title: “Ok if you are looking for a cheap place to stay”

Reviews.Title: “Best value if you just need a bed to sleep”

Reviews.Content: excellent bare imagine service practically epitomises term nofrills communal functions breakfast kitchen reception lounge absolutely job youre spend time basically hostel private shared bathroom facilities dont stay youre family romantic break etc stay youre traveller backpacker youngish etc ive amsterdam times ive stayed terms value money stuff cheapest amsterdam pretty facilities toilet shower safe youre bothered stuff breakfast included bread toaster table coffee machine yourself vending machine sells cans beer ridiculously lax smoking policy staff doubtless due curfew decent town nice neighbourhood near zoo 2 pcs communal offering free internet possibly 5 minutes walk main town im bit churlish definitely worth stairs dangerously steep amsterdam
